txt.en: This ornamented wooden ox would seem to be a shrine of some kind.\n\nPerhaps one of the Rangers of the Grey Company will know more about it.

'The Algraig herdsmen we encountered in the Windfells are of a tribe called the Uch-l√ªth -- the Clan of the Ox -- who dwell in Nan Laeglin. It does not seem strange to me that they might worship the oxen, as that is their namesake, but it does seem strange that such a shrine should be found in these forsaken woods, so far north and west of their grazing fields.\n\n'What is more, you tell me that this shrine appears to be in pristine condition, as though it has been visited and cared for recently...perhaps a hermit lives nearby?'
You found an ornamented wooden ox in the wilds of the Gloomglens. Perhaps it was intended to be a shrine of some kind.
Talk to a Ranger at Echad Idhrenfair
There are Rangers at Echad Idhrenfair to the south-west of the shrine.\n\nYou should ask one of the Rangers of the Grey Company about the ox-shrine you discovered.
